name: Operation Thunderbolt
overview: Bringing you enhanced shoot-'em-up action for one or two players, THUNDERBOLT not only reproduces the horizontally-scrolling gameplay of WOLF, but adds 3D action to the scenario as you test your nerve against swooping jets, helicopters, tanks and many more awesome adversaries! Use the laser sight or the bulletproof vest, but watch out for those air-to-ground missiles!
